entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
